name: Omron OMRON HJ329 Alvita Ultimate Pedometer (Silver) OMRHJ329

reviews.name: Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: This Pedometer is very easy to set up and use. Once I set it up, I just put it on and go. I can put it in my pocket or purse/bag and my steps are still counted. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking to count how many steps they are taking daily. I can go back and look at 7 days of steps I have taken.
reviews.title: Great Pedometer for a beginner

reviews.name: Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: The Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer is an excellent pedometer. I have had a different brand but it was not as accurate as Omron. I like every thing about this device. I like the way it counts my steps and it can be worn on your side at any time. Omron makes excellent products.
reviews.title: This is a great pedometer for a beginner.

reviews.name: Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: a little hard to set up, but once you get the hang of it very accurate.
reviews.title: very acurate..

reviews.name: Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: I have owned 3 other pedometers before this one, and none of them worked well. They were either hard to set up or inaccurate. This Omron pedometer works flawlessly if you set it up correctly. Size is perfect and it clips to your clothes or can be used in your pocket. Great price at walmart.com. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Finally a pedometer that works!

reviews.name: Omron Alvita Ultimate Digital Fitness Pedometer
reviews.reviewText: A lady at Powerhouse told me what make (brand) she had - so I ordered this one. 2 people who work at the gym and myself could not figure it out. And it said the battery was already in and it wasn't (it was in plastic bag) - The lady that had the same make could not figure out how it worked either - I am going to return it and I think you have other models.
reviews.title: confusing
